word_mean: 标准化：使任一制剂在质量或成份方面达到特定的标准
规格化：为一种物质或操作标准制定公式
标准化法两个及两个以上总率（总均数）进行对比时，为了消除内部构成不同的影响，采用统一标准。

sentence.Network_cn: 在温度标准化中采用盐溶液.

entry.def: To standardize things means to change them so that they all have the same features.

example.ex: There is a drive both to standardise components and to reduce the number of models on offer...
example.tran: 正在为实现零部件标准化和减少推出的型号数量而努力。

example.ex: He feels standardized education does not benefit those children who are either below or above average intelligence.
example.tran: 他认为标准化教育对那些智力水平低于或超出平均水平的儿童没有好处。

means.word_mean: 1. the condition in which a standard has been successfully established;

sentences.sentence: "standardization of nuts and bolts had saved industry millions of dollars"

means.word_mean: 2. the imposition of standards or regulations;

sentences.sentence: "a committee was appointed to recommend terminological standardization"

means.word_mean: 3. the act of checking or adjusting (by comparison with a standard) the accuracy of a measuring instrument;
